name: Chasing Chains
description:
Created during the 2020 lockdown. 

There's pain and suffering all around us, but we're told to keep chasing our chance at a glitzy, glamorous life rather than face the problems right in front of us. Our desire to escape financial struggles by joining the upper-class keeps us chained to our current systems, bound to our wage-slave lives serving an invisible oligarchy.

Cierra Maher // @CierraShares
Mixed-media collage on canvas, 2020.
USA.

4010px x 5029px
